Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: The Tel Aviv Municipality Developing Fund organized a special concert saluting millionaire Armand Hammer for his support to the Tel Aviv Orchestra which its musicians are all new immigrants from the former Soviet Union.
